Package goal.core.mas

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentFile
    An AgentFile contains one line in the MAS file agentfiles section, like this "tictactoe.goal" [name = player, language=K]. The quoted string refers to the filename.
    EntityDesc
    Contains an entity description, that is a label-parameter, a type-parameter, and a maximum-parameter.
    EnvironmentInfo
    Represents the parsed environment information from the MAS file.
    Launch
    A launch is the part of a LaunchRule after the condition.
    LaunchRule
    A launch-rule is a launch with a precondition.
    MASProgram
    A MAS-program consists of optionally: an environment info block, containing: a non-empty list of jar files each being an EIS environment an initializer for the first environment.
    MultiLaunch
    A multilaunch instantiates one or several agents at the beginning of the execution.
